channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Live: WA World Championship Athletics
channel.desc: Five world champions are crowned on the second day of the World Athletics Championships from Tokyo as the fastest men and women in the world take to the track. After winning Olympic silver in Paris 2024, Matthew Hudson-Smith starts his campaign for a first world title as he lines up in the heats of the men's 400 metres. Great Britain's world indoor champion Amber Anning is in action in qualifying for the women's 400m.
